model

Class Map

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Map

  • public class Map
extends java.lang.Object
    The map class represents the game board and everything on it. This includes hexes, ports, roads, settlements, cities, the radius of the board, and the robber.
    Author:
    Jesse McArthur

      • addHex

        public void addHex(int x,
                   int y,
                   java.lang.String resource,
                   int number)
            throws FailureToAddException
        adds a hex to the maps list of hexes
        Parameters:
        x - - horizontal location of hex
        y - - diagonal location of hex
        resource - - type of resource obtained from hex
        number - - index of owner
        Throws:
        FailureToAddException

      • canAddPort

        public boolean canAddPort(Port port)
        checks to see if port can be added

      • addPort

        public void addPort(int x,
                    int y,
                    java.lang.String resource,
                    EdgeDirection ed,
                    int ratio)
             throws FailureToAddException
        adds a port to the maps list of ports
        Parameters:
        x - - horizontal location of hex related to port
        y - - diagonal location of hex related to port
        resource - - type of resource obtained from hex
        ed - - direction from hex the port is located
        ratio - - the ratio of resources tradeable (i.e 1:2, 1:4)
        Throws:
        FailureToAddException
